1124540.name: Coloring Pixels - Variety Pack
1124540.description:
Variety Book

Unlocks the Variety Pack book for Coloring Pixels! Includes 20 new levels from a variety of genres to complete! Expect vehicles, city-scapes, landscapes, and various other peculiar objects.

Contents

The Variety book unlocks the following images:
  • Coin - 12x12
  • Cherry - 13x16
  • Orb - 14x16
  • Snake - 15x16
  • Bot - 16x16
  • Moonshine - 16x16
  • Bow - 23x60
  • Portal - 31x57
  • Guillotine - 43x60
  • Well - 44x42
  • Car - 54x114
  • Cabin - 80x80
  • Fly Trap - 105x72
  • Meteorite - 128x128
  • Punk - 128x128
  • Stone Dragon - 227x147
  • Metro - 240x240
  • Steam Train - 254x52
  • Forest - 300x270
  • Mountain Range - 340x270
